# 2000 Jade Solid Gold Awards

The 2000 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held on 14 January 2001. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 2000 are as follows.
